quizHistoryIds.description: An array of IDs referencing the user's quiz history.

QuizHistory.title: Quiz History
QuizHistory.description: Represents a single quiz attempt by a user.

id.description: The unique ID for this quiz attempt.

userId.description: The ID of the user who took the quiz.

score.description: The number of questions the user answered correctly.

totalQuestions.description: The total number of questions in the quiz.

dateTaken.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of when the quiz was completed.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profile information for each user.

/users/{userId}/quizHistory/{historyId}.description: Stores the quiz history for a specific user.
